select sa.id , sa.create_time , sa.create_user , sa.update_time , sa.update_user , sa.username , su.name , group_concat(sr.name) as role_name, sa.nickname , sa.avatar , sa.status from sys_account sa left join sys_user su on sa.user_id = su.id left join sys_account_role sar on sa.id = sar.account_id left join sys_role sr on sar.role_id = sr.id
and sa.username like CONCAT('%',#{accountUserRole.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and su.name like CONCAT('%',#{accountUserRole.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and sa.nickname like CONCAT('%',#{accountUserRole.nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and sa.status = #{accountUserRole.status,jdbcType=TINYINT}
group by sa.id

select sa.id , sa.create_time , sa.create_user , sa.update_time , sa.update_user , sa.username , sa.enabled, su.name , group_concat(sr.name ORDER by sr.name DESC) as role_name, sa.nickname , sa.avatar , sa.status from sys_account sa left join sys_user su on sa.user_id = su.id left join sys_account_role sar on sa.id = sar.account_id left join sys_role sr on sar.role_id = sr.id
sa.deleted = 0
and sa.username like CONCAT('%',#{accountUserRole.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and su.name like CONCAT('%',#{accountUserRole.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and sa.nickname like CONCAT('%',#{accountUserRole.nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and sa.status = #{accountUserRole.status,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and sa.enabled = #{accountUserRole.enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT}
group by sa.id
